House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03617
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING THE PRESIDENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES EMERGENCY POWERS TO ADDRESS THE TRAFFIC CONGESTION CRISIS IN METRO MANILA AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Traffic Crisis Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Empowers the President to utilize the necessary government resources, to exercise or employ executive actions and measures, necessary and incidental, unhampered by existing laws, regulations, and procedures to solve Metro Manila traffic and transport crisis.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BELMONTE, JOSE CHRISTOPHER Y.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-14
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
NATURE : Economic
